MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G32 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:33pm. Our emergency response team have now arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
